DOC.brief_summary: The study conduct participant type 2 diabetes insulin injection therapy investigate body process test formulation insulin lispro effect test formulation blood sugar level . Side effect tolerability document . The study conduct two part ( Part A Part B ) achieve objective . Participants expect enroll part .
DOC.brief_title: A Study New Type Insulin Participants With Type 2 Diabetes Insulin Injection Therapy
DOC.criteria: Are male female participant Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) Are stable prandial insulin multiple daily injection regimen , plus/minus basal insulin , without stable dose metformin , least 3 month screen Have body mass index ( BMI ) great 35.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/mÂ² ) Have blood pressure , pulse rate , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , blood urine laboratory test result acceptable study Have episode severe hypoglycemia past 6 month ( require assistance treatment second party ) Have venous access sufficient allow blood sample Have provide write consent willing follow study procedure commit study duration Are currently enrol , participate within last 30 day , clinical trial type medical research judge incompatible study Have previously complete withdrawn study Have use health problem , opinion doctor , could make unsafe participate study Had blood loss 500 milliliter ( mL ) within last month Are treat continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion ( insulin pump )
